hero.title: Cybersecurity Engineer & Developer
hero.subtitle: Passionate about offensive security, tool development and technological innovation

about.title: About Me
about.description: Computer Science and Cybersecurity Engineering student at ECE Paris, I specialize in offensive security, tool development and threat analysis. With hands-on experience in SOC, pentesting and secure application development, I constantly seek to deepen my technical skills.

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Engineer Intern
description: Security incident response management (SOC) through forensic analysis and advanced response coordination
Deployment and configuration of Fortinet solutions (FortiGate, FortiMail Cloud, FortiAnalyzer)
Trellix EDR solutions administration and Active Directory audit report automation

jobs.title: Business Discovery Intern
jobs.company: General Consulate of the Dominican Republic
description: Optimization of administrative workflows through technical solutions implementation

jobs.title: Independent Contractor
description: Event and technical missions for various clients (Coca-Cola, Wild Code School)
Logistics coordination and Python educational content development

items.title: Security Scanner
items.description: Security assessment tool in Bash for Red Teams, integrating OSINT, network, web and exploitation modules. Interactive interface and adaptive modes to optimize pentesting audits.

items.title: Encryptor
items.description: Multi-platform file encryption utility in Bash and OpenSSL. Implementation of 8 modern algorithms (AES-256-GCM, ChaCha20) and secure key management via Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC).

items.title: SABER
items.description: Secure web platform with Next.js for document encryption and decryption. Backend and interface development to ensure confidentiality of sensitive data exchanges.

items.title: IoC App Altice
items.description: Application for managing and analyzing Indicators of Compromise (IoC) to improve threat detection and incident response.

items.title: Warhammer 40k Terminal Display
items.description: Creative project combining passion for Warhammer 40k and development skills. Stylized and interactive terminal interface.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out!
